TopicTitle: I just found the best/worst game: Voar

Articles.Content:
So imagine Flappy Bird and KSP had a baby.

http://voar.io/

This is that baby
Pretty addictive. Just played it for a while. I can see it as a good time waster.
It's fun, I even made it to the top of the leader board for about five seconds.
Can't play it now (on mobile), but judging by your description it looks like a flappy birds game with orbital mechanics. Wasn't there a game like that before? I swear I had it on my phone.

Thanks for sharing! It kept me playing for thirty minutes, to which I accomplished this:

Huehuehue...
What do you do? Like how do you get points? Just survive or what?

What do you do? Like how do you get points? Just survive or what?

Yes, just survive and watch out for the rogue planet.

Thanks for sharing! It kept me playing for thirty minutes, to which I accomplished this:

http://i.imgur.com/in1FevEl.png

Huehuehue...

Oooooh, it's the one from imgur then. I did play that one, and it's kinda cool. I just wish you had more control over your orbit.

Oooooh, it's the one from imgur then. I did play that one, and it's kinda cool. I just wish you had more control over your orbit.

Yeah, do you just keep accelerating or can you jump retrograde?

Also, I wish your orbit was darker: I can hardly see it.

Occasionally there's a large planet that moves through the system, you can use it's gravity to swing yourself retrograde.

For a flash game, it's not exactly terrible.

HAH!

Eat that, Internet!

(So many people don't know anything about orbital mechanics on this game... they just aim straight at you.

EDIT:

This run was better, 2k+ points, and then I was kilt. (I was leader for like five minutes. )

Edited November 9, 2014 by Starwhip
I found that an highly eccentric orbit is a great way to kill others. Keep that in mind. Also, I nicknamed the rogue planet/Mun Satan's Comet.

Strategy: Low-altitude orbit, elliptical, to rack up points fast. When orbit path is hitting planet, wait until last moment to correct for most points. Then, boost up to a higher orbit and stay there, and you should be fairly safe. (I wasn't quite high enough that time )
It's great. Except the stupid missile players.

It's down, so it's probably being updated! Yay!

I like to be in LEO waiting to intercept players with bad names.

I got the following message:

Welcome to nginx!

If you see this page, the nginx web server is successfully installed and working. Further configuration is required.

For online documentation and support please refer to nginx.org.

Commercial support is available at nginx.com.

Thank you for using nginx.

So this is what I will spend the rest of my evening doing... Oh well! KSP will have to wait.

This thing is funny
